md:
giải nghĩa từ "rechecking" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* rechecking (noun)
	+ Meaning: the act of checking something again to make sure it is correct or accurate.
	+ Type: noun
	+ Example: "The accountant did a thorough rechecking of the financial records to ensure their accuracy."
	+ Related words: checking, verification, review, examination
	+ Antonyms: ignoring, overlooking, neglecting

* rechecking (verb)
	+ Meaning: to check something again to make sure it is correct or accurate.
	+ Type: verb
	+ Example: "The teacher rechecked the student's work to ensure it was correct."
	+ Related words: checking, verifying, reviewing, examining
	+ Antonyms: ignoring, overlooking, neglecting
html:
giải nghĩa từ "rechecking" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  • rechecking (noun)

    • Meaning: the act of checking something again to make sure it is correct or accurate.
    • Type: noun
    • Example: "The accountant did a thorough rechecking of the financial records to ensure their accuracy."
    • Related words: checking, verification, review, examination
    • Antonyms: ignoring, overlooking, neglecting

  • rechecking (verb)

    • Meaning: to check something again to make sure it is correct or accurate.
    • Type: verb
    • Example: "The teacher rechecked the student's work to ensure it was correct."
    • Related words: checking, verifying, reviewing, examining
    • Antonyms: ignoring, overlooking, neglecting
